remarks: Theorem 19.2 of [Margaris] p. 89.  Note:  This proof is very different from Margaris' because we only have Tarski's FOL axiom schemes available at this point.  See the later ~ 19.2g for a more conventional proof of a more general result, which uses additional axioms.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2017.)  Remove dependency on ~ ax-7 .  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 4-Dec-2017.)
